mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rule_component ( tenant_id, component_id, component_name, description, component_type, component_code, status, application_name, script_enable, language, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{componentId}, #{componentName}, #{description}, #{componentType}, #{content}, #{status}, #{applicationName}, #{scriptEnable}, #{language}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE rule_component SET component_name = #{componentName}, description = #{description}, component_code = #{content}, status = #{status}, application_name = #{applicationName}, script_enable = #{scriptEnable}, language = #{language}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, tenant_id, component_id, component_name, description, component_type, component_code, status, application_name, script_enable, language, created_at, updated_at FROM rule_component WHERE application_name = #{applicationName} AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND status = 'PUBLISHED' AND script_enable = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
